mapper.select: select smrs.id,smrs.months,smrs.type,count(smrs.id) as num,sum(remaining_unpaid_amount) as total from sys_meter_reading_share_details as smrsd,sys_meter_reading_share as smrs where smrsd.share_bill_id = smrs.id and smrsd.estate_id = #{estateId} and smrsd.status in (1,2) GROUP BY smrsd.share_bill_id
select * from sys_meter_reading_share_details where share_bill_id = #{shareBillId} and estate_id = #{estateId} and status in (1,2)
